Name: Estimative marker
Description: the shape of the estimative marker (generally an affix)

Name: Productivity of estimative
Description: productivity of the morphological estimative pattern

Name: Possible bases for estimative
Description: the word classes with which estimative markers can be combined

Name: Other functions of estimative
Description: other functions that morphological estimative constructions may have

Name: Estimative alignment type
Description: direct alignment or indirect alignment of estimative
